original_title: 団鬼六×「無垢」本格ドラマ 奴隷少女
overview: "Dan Oniroku x Muku Authentic Drama" Nomura, who was fired from his insurance agency due to restructuring, plots a plan with his bad friend Nakayama to vent his anger. "I want to train an innocent virgin for one night, so I want to SM train it." The two of them had intended to spend only one night, but they were captivated by the joy of training Miyako, who was well-bred and beautiful. Oniroku Dan's original "Guy Girl" AV live-action adaptation.
title: Oniroku Dan x “Innocence” – Original Drama Barely Legal Teen Captive Natsu Tojo
